name: Bula! Bam! Letra!
description:
"Bula! Bam! Letra!" is a 2D bubble shooter where the player shoots a set of bubbles to acquire letters wherein they have to complete spelling a word on the right side of the screen. The player will have access to the audio of how the word sounds by clicking the audio button on the left side of the blank space provided. The progression of the game is based on how complicated the word is and is separated by levels.

Note: The game makes use of the Filipino language and it is specific to the grade school students of P. Villanueva Elementary School.
